issue.title: [Rust] Improve array limit function where max records > len
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4769](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4769). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When we have an array of n records, and we want to take a limit that's higher or equat to n, we still iterate through the array values and create a new array.

We could improve this by returning a copy of the array as-is.
